cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet.CONFIDENTIAL. Copy No. 28CP. 14 (29).Sir E, Eloward to Sir Austen Chamberlain. (Received January 25.) (No. 59.)(Telegraphic.) Washington, January 24, 1929.I WAS informed to-day on good authority that there is every prospect of Fifteen-Cruiser Bill passing Senate in a week at the most. There is likely to be a good deal of discussion over time-limit, with regard to which the Senate is a good deal divided.4745 [18781]
